header.title: What my students and parents say
header.subtitle: Real results from IBDP, A Level and IGCSE students worldwide.

video.heading: Real students talking about their WSMath journey
video.subheading: Short clips from different students sharing how they improved with Winsonâ€™s coaching.

featured.name: Alice Gao (2022)
featured.role: IBDP AAHL â€” From Level 6 to 7
featured.quote: I had the great fortune of being tutored by Winson during my IBDP years. Winson's passion for tutoring is evident in every session. He pinpoints specific areas where I need assistance and tailors his instruction to address my challenges. His notes are clear, concise, and easy to grasp. One standout aspect was the wealth of past paper questions he provided, meticulously sorted by topics and years. I am truly grateful for his guidance.

featured.name: Bill Ting (2021)
featured.role: Edexcel IAL Math + Further Math â€” From F to A*

featured.name: Jason Yeung (2025)
featured.quote: Mr. Siu is the best math teacher I have ever had. His explanations, particularly for calculus, are outstanding. His resources are comprehensive, offering targeted exercises and past papers dating back to the 2000s. He was also a great motivator, encouraging me to complete past papers and homework when my own drive was low.

carousel.name: James Chow (2024)
carousel.role: IBDP AAHL â€” From 1 to 7
carousel.quote: Siu Sir is an exceptional educator with a genuine passion for teaching. His thoughtful compilation of past paper questions, detailed booklets, and chapter notes made practice structured and effective. When I nearly gave up, Siu Sirâ€™s belief in me was pivotal. He was flexible with extra lessons and answered questions outside class.

carousel.name: Lucia Zhu (2018)
carousel.role: IBDP Math HL â€” From 3 to 6 [in 3 months]
carousel.quote: When I received my disappointing grade, I knew I had to get help immediately. Winson is familiar with IBDP exam details, past paper styles, and exam techniques. He quickly spotted my weaknesses, set a tailored plan, and trained me with past papers. His notes sort key concepts methodically and logically, helping me learn systematically and feel more confident.

We go through many exercises and questions during our lessons, and I can learn a lot. I now have more confidence in math, thanks to Winson.

carousel.name: Judy Wei (2021)
carousel.role: IBDP AAHL â€” From 2 to 5
carousel.quote: Winson's tutoring helped me immensely during the period of the COVID online class. Especially for someone who wasn't an active learner, I could follow his path and finish all the assignments/past papers. The lesson notes he provided with detailed formulas and keywords have been a major source for revision material.
carousel.university: The Chinese University of Hong Kong

carousel.name: Vivian Chen (2018)
carousel.role: IBDP Math HL â€” From 2 to 5
carousel.quote: Finding Winson as my IBDP Math tutor was an incredible stroke of luck! He truly saved me from my struggles with IBDP Math HL. His teaching style is both enjoyable and easily understandable. His fluency in Mandarin, English, and Cantonese was a tremendous asset, allowing me to learn the language I felt most comfortable with.

carousel.name: Gordon Lo (2023)
carousel.role: Cambridge IGCSE 0607 â€” From E to A
carousel.quote: My impression of Mr. Siu has never truly changed. Winson is a kind and reliable mentor, which is why I enjoy mathematics so much. His method is simple and efficient: learn the key concepts of each topic and apply them to past paper questions. I appreciate having lessons with Winson.

carousel.name: Aidan Cheung (2019)
carousel.role: IBDP Math HL â€” From 4 to 6
carousel.quote: Winson is a great Math Tutor who breaks down concepts easily and applies his learning to practical exam questions. He carefully procures exam questions in a neatly formatted workbook full of practice questions for every lesson.

carousel.name: David Zhang (2020)

carousel.name: Ken Chen (2024)
carousel.role: Edexcel GCEAL Math â€” From F to A
carousel.quote: Winson has a unique teaching approach that I greatly admire. He diligently compiles valuable past paper questions for practice before and after each class, often taking several days to complete. Working closely with Winson has been instrumental.
